backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing file storage, folder management, mission/task system, notes, user profiles, and authorization with blob storage mixins, access control, and diagnostic endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features for live stack inbox, file organization indicators, and animation behaviors with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including App, HomePage, Header, FileUpload, Gallery, dialogs, hooks, and utilities with their key behaviors and integrations.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation establishing Draft baseline synced 1:1 with Live version 114, including validation checklist for authentication, actor initialization, UI/UX behavior, and core flows smoke test procedure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and UI component color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with PWA configuration, service worker registration, iOS-specific meta tags, and MYL branding with bullseye icon references.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change control freeze notice prohibiting all code changes after Live v114 restoration until explicit user approval with change list is provided.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining MYL app metadata, standalone display mode, purple theme color, and icon references for 192x192 and 512x512 bullseye icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing network-first caching strategy with runtime cache trimming, offline fallback to index.html, and skip of canister API calls.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Comprehensive PWA installability verification guide for Chrome on Android, covering manifest requirements, service worker checks, testing procedures, and troubleshooting common issues.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive checklist documenting the restoration and verification of Live version 114 frontend code, including authentication flow, UI components, file management, and behavior verification steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component wrapping HomePage with ThemeProvider, QueryClientProvider, ActorProvider, UploadProvider, and conditional IntroScreen display on app resume when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: Error state component displaying actor initialization failures with collapsible technical details, retry/logout actions, and specialized messaging for stopped canisters and invalid admin tokens.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG icon with concentric target rings, crosshairs, corner markers, and a pulsing center bullseye. Includes hover effects with color transitions and a glow effect.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed horizontal decorative border line near the bottom of the screen with theme-aware styling.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog component that appears when a file cannot be opened in a new window, offering retry and download options with warning styling.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog for previewing files with support for images, videos, PDFs, and Office documents. Includes actions for download, external open, send to folder, move to mission, and delete with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file uploads, link creation, and note creation with speech-to-text support. Manages concurrent uploads with a limiter, persists to IndexedDB, and provides progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Fixed-position button component for accessing folders, featuring a folder icon with hover effects, pulse animation support, and accessibility attributes.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated dialog component for managing folders (create, rename, delete) with swipe actions. Marked for removal in favor of FoldersFullScreenView.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full-screen view for managing folders with create, rename, delete operations using swipe actions. Includes folder selection and navigation back to previous screen.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer component with copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai, styled with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen file viewer with navigation, keyboard/touch controls, and actions (download, delete, share, move to folder/mission) for viewing files in a gallery.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Main gallery component displaying files and notes with grid layout, bulk selection, long-press interactions, and integration with folders, missions, and file organization features.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with animated gallery icon, theme toggle (light/dark), sign-out dropdown menu, and unified progress bar.
frontend/src/components/HomeSharedElemen: Provides shared element transition animations with backdrop blur when opening/closing folders or missions sections.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Displays an animated splash screen with the gallery icon that fades out after 2 seconds on app load.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when browser blocks opening a link, offering retry and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LiveStackInbox.t: Fixed bottom-right stack preview showing up to 3 unorganized files with slide-in animations for newly uploaded items.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component for Internet Identity authentication with loading state indicator.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen view for a single mission showing title, tasks, attached files, and notes with autosave functionality. Supports task toggling, adding tasks, viewing attachments, and external link handling.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating new missions with title input and task list management. Handles task addition, removal, and completion toggling before mission creation.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating action button component with Target icon for opening the missions view. Supports disabled state, pulse animation, and z-index control.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen missions list view with tabs for incomplete/completed missions, swipe-to-delete actions, and navigation to mission detail view. Handles mission creation and deletion.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Simple layout wrapper component that constrains children to a mobile-only container with specific styling classes.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving files and notes to a selected mission. Displays mission list as clickable cards and handles batch move operations.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a single note with actions to send to folder/mission, download, share, and delete. Displays note title and body in a scrollable area.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog component for moving files and notes to folders or returning them to the main collection, with performance diagnostics tracking and loading states.
Swipeable row component with touch gesture support that reveals edit and delete action buttons when swiped left.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Fixed progress bar component that displays upload progress for active file, link, and note uploads with percentage and item counts.
frontend/src/components/UploadQueueRunne: Background component that restores and resumes pending uploads from persisted queue on app load, managing concurrent uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Welcome screen with animated target/crosshair logo and introductory text explaining the app's purpose, including a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: React context provider that manages backend actor initialization with identity authentication, exponential backoff retry logic, and error classification for stopped canisters.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: React context that manages upload progress tracking for files, links, and notes, providing functions to start uploads, update progress, complete uploads, and restore items with automatic cleanup after completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFileOrganizationSt: Hook that identifies unorganized files (those not in any folder or mission) by querying root files and returning a Set of unorganized file IDs for efficient lookup.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Hook that prefetches core data (folders, files, missions, notes) once when the actor becomes ready and user is authenticated, using a ref to prevent refetch loops.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with idle handling options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Hook that detects when the app returns to foreground (visibility change or window focus) and invokes a callback only when user is authenticated and initialization is complete.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Hook that detects if the device has a coarse pointer (touch device) using media queries, returning true for mobile/touch and false for desktop/mouse devices.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Hook that provides debounced autosave functionality for mission edits, tracking changes from hydrated state, handling mission switches, and queuing updates during active saves.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for mission CRUD operations (list, get, create, update) with optimistic updates, targeted cache invalidations, and BigInt-safe comparisons for sorting and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: React Query hooks for managing notes CRUD operations (create, delete, update) with targeted cache invalidation based on folder/mission context and concurrency limiting.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for file and folder operations including paginated fetches, uploads with concurrency limiting (3 concurrent), and mutations with performance diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Custom hook wrapping Web Speech Recognition API for continuous speech-to-text with interim results, error handling, and configurable language support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including specialized color schemes for notes (green) and missions (purple) sections.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main home page component managing folders/missions full-screen views, file uploads, gallery display, authentication state, and optional dev-mode smoke tests with lazy-loaded views.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Provides utilities for detecting and classifying actor initialization errors (not ready, stopped canister, invalid admin token) and standardizing user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Contains functions for opening URLs externally, downloading files, sharing files via Web Share API, and handling file/note downloads with popup blocker detection.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytesWorkerSingle: Manages a singleton Web Worker for reading file bytes with concurrency limiting (max 3 concurrent requests) and request queuing.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines the primary action (in-app viewer vs. download-only) when a user opens a file based on its MIME type category.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type (image, video, PDF, office, unsupported) and provides helpers to check if files are previewable in-app and get human-readable type labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Calculates mission progress percentage, determines completion status (100% with at least 1 task), and splits missions into incomplete/completed lists.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Provides BigInt-safe equality comparison for Task arrays by comparing taskId, task text, and completed status without using JSON.stringify.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty utility file with no content.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Opt-in performance diagnostics utility (via localStorage or URL param) that logs operation timings and provides helpers for timing async operations.
Manages an IndexedDB-backed upload queue for persisting file uploads (up to 50MB) with progress tracking, completion marking, and recovery capabilities.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Development-only logging helper for React Query mutation lifecycle phases (start, success, error, settled) with timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Development utility that runs smoke tests for core application flows (folder, mission, link, and note creation) by executing backend operations and verifying results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Provides concurrency limiters for managing parallel task execution with configurable limits, including a cancellable variant with queue statistics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/src/workers/fileBytes.worker.ts: Web Worker that reads file bytes off the main thread, converting Files to Uint8Arrays and returning metadata with error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme for sidebar/notes/missions, and animation utilities.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files that define the v114 baseline, organized by category (core, components, contexts, hooks, utilities, styling, PWA, configuration) for repeatable validation.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document defining the Live Stack Inbox feature for newly uploaded files with slide animations, unorganized indicators, and gallery integration requirements.
